name: generate_title
description: Generate a SEO-optimized YouTube video title for music content based on mood, theme, and duration.

mood.description: The emotional mood of the video (e.g., relaxing, sad, hopeful, nostalgic, lonely, peaceful).

theme.description: The theme or visual setting of the video (e.g., rainy night, moonlight, window view, forest, streetlamp).

duration.description: The duration of the video (e.g., 30 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 8 hours).
